modName: Arnold Schwarzenegger   -1-   Conan The Real Barbarian
summary: For all those people who are not happy with the versions of Conan. Well, i tried to create the most realistic Conan. Enjoy it.  ____   P.D. Any similarity to reality is purely coincidental
descriptionHtml:
Update:
------------
if you want look like arnold, check my uploads. added new file with the right steps to get this look. remember open console and type: showracemenu

IMPORTANT!!
to get this look also you need the following mods:
----------------
Conan the barbarian Outfit   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4793
AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male  -  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488%20%20%20BetterMales_Nudes_NoTextureFaces_v1-8

Description:
---------------

Arnold \"The Oak\" like as Conan \"The Barbarian\" save game at Helgen gates just before Alduin attack!!

Install:
---------------
you need extract files into your save folder C:\\Users\\Username\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves (click \'yes to overwrite\' if needed)

IMPORTANT!!
to get this look also you need the following mods:
----------------
Conan the barbarian Outfit   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4793
AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male  -  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces   -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488%20%20%20BetterMales_Nudes_NoTextureFaces_v1-8

Optional:
Conan Atlantean Sword  -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4346
Conan Warpaint  -   http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3817


Uninstall:
.............
Just delete the files from where you installed them.
author: Lobotomia2040
